stamina - Variable in class net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.model.DriverBase
Lower stamina value means the driver loses more of his skill during the session, and also makes the driver to become tired earlier (which increases the likelihood of AI programmed mistakes)
stamina - Variable in class net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.model.xml.XMLDriver
Lower stamina value means the driver loses more of his skill during the session, and also makes the driver to become tired earlier (which increases the likelihood of AI programmed mistakes)

START_REACTIONS_TOOLTIP - Static variable in class net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.util.TooltipUtil
 
startReactions - Variable in class net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.model.DriverBase
Lower start_reactions value means the driver will take more time to react to the race green flag and is more likely to make race start programmed mistakes at the moment of the race green flag (like losing rear grip with some smoke).
startReactions - Variable in class net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.model.xml.XMLDriver
Lower start_reactions value means the driver will take more time to react to the race green flag and is more likely to make race start programmed mistakes at the moment of the race green flag (like losing rear grip with some smoke).
startReactionsCheckBox - Variable in class net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui.MassModifyToolController
CheckBox that determines if startReactions property should be modified.

Lightweight accessor method.
startReactionsSlider - Variable in class net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui.editor.DriverEditor
Slider that determines the driver's startReactions.
startReactionsTextField - Variable in class net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui.editor.DriverEditor
TextField that displays the value of the driver's startReactions.
